verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Savior Thy dying love Thou gavest me Nor should I aught withold Dear Lord from Thee In love my soul would bow My heart fulfil it's vow Some off'ring bring Thee now Something for Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}At the blest mercy seat Pleading for me My feeble faith looks up Jesus to Thee Help me the cross to bear Thy wondrous love declare Some song to raise or prayer Something for Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Give me a faithful heart Likeness to Thee That each departing day Hence forth may see Some work of love begun Some deed of kindness done Some wand'rer sought and won Something for Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All that I am and have Thy gifts so free In joy in grief through life Dear Lord for Thee And when Thy face I see My ransomed soul shall be Through all eternity Something for Thee{/lang-eng}
